Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball is averaging 30.1 points, 7.4 assists, 5.3 rebounds and 1.3 steals in 22 games this season.
Others: The Charlotte Hornets are in 14th place in the Eastern Conference with a 7-25 record.
The Hornets were on an eight-game losing streak before facing the Detroit Pistons on Friday.
